duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct strategic and operational support across the Firm's industry teams.
Work closely with Industry Team Leaders, department and practice leaders, attorneys, and Firm administrative departments to support the Firm's long-term business strategy.
Assist with developing strategic goals for assigned industry teams; prepare and manage team implementation plans.
Identify and analyze market and legal trends; complete client and matter coding training; and prepare periodic reports on key metrics.
Prepare annual meeting industry sessions within assigned industry teams; promote internal awareness of the Firm's capabilities and opportunities within assigned industries.
Execute internal educational programs to keep internal lawyers informed of industry developments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree and a minimum of ten years of related work experience including five years of project management and/or strategic planning and execution expertise.
